I am Jari Hanski and this is my Game Programming Portfolio

I have previously started my own company and acted as a CTO. I am currently studying Game Design and Programming in Uppsala university.

Chaos Gate remake
X-COM (or Phoenix point) style remake of the classic Chaos Gate game. Includes Ultramarines against the forces of Chaos.
Scallywags
Scallywags!' is a chaotic, couch co-op game where you and your friends need to survive the journey over the open seas.
Space Hulk remake
Modern take on classics like Space Hulk and Space Crusade.
